title: Aim
description_detail: A super-easy way to record, search and compare AI experiments.
description-github: Aim 💫 — An easy-to-use & supercharged open-source experiment tracker.

title: Catalyst
description_detail: High-level utils for PyTorch DL & RL research. It was developed with a focus on reproducibility, fast experimentation and code/ideas reusing.
description-github: Accelerated deep learning R&D

title: ClearML
description_detail: Auto-Magical Experiment Manager & Version Control for AI (previously Trains).
description-github: ClearML - Auto-Magical CI/CD to streamline your ML workflow. Experiment Manager, MLOps and Data-Management

title: CodaLab
description_detail: CodaLab Worksheets is a collaborative platform for reproducible research that allows researchers to run, manage, and share their experiments in the cloud. It helps researchers ensure that their runs are reproducible and consistent.
description-github: A collaborative platform for reproducible research (web interface and CLI).

title: Data Version Control (DVC)
description_detail: A git fork that allows for version management of models.
description-github: 🦉 ML Experiments Management with Git

title: Deepkit
description_detail: An open-source platform and cross-platform desktop application to execute, track, and debug modern machine learning experiments.
description-github: The collaborative real-time open-source machine learning devtool and training suite: Experiment execution, tracking, and debugging. With server and project management tools.

title: Dolt
description_detail: Dolt is a SQL database that you can fork, clone, branch, merge, push and pull just like a git repository.
description-github: Dolt – Git for Data

title: Flor
description_detail: Easy to use logger and automatic version controller made for data scientists who write ML code.
description-github: 🌻 FlorFlow: Flor, now with Dataflow

title: Guild AI
description_detail: Open source toolkit that automates and optimizes machine learning experiments.
description-github: Experiment tracking, ML developer tools

title: Hangar
description_detail: Version control for tensor data, git-like semantics on numerical data with high speed and efficiency.
description-github: Hangar is version control for tensor data. Commit, branch, merge, revert, and collaborate in the data-defined software era.

title: Keepsake
description_detail: Version control for machine learning.
description-github: Version control for machine learning

title: lakeFS
description_detail: Repeatable, atomic and versioned data lake on top of object storage.
description-github: lakeFS - Data version control for your data lake | Git for data

title: MLflow
description_detail: Open source platform to manage the ML lifecycle, including experimentation, reproducibility and deployment.
description-github: Open source platform for the machine learning lifecycle

title: ModelDB
description_detail: An open-source system to version machine learning models including their ingredients code, data, config, and environment and to track ML metadata across the model lifecycle.
description-github: No Description

title: ModelStore
description_detail: An open-source Python library that allows you to version, export, and save a machine learning model to your cloud storage provider.
description-github: 🏬 modelstore is a Python library that allows you to version, export, and save a machine learning model to your filesystem or a cloud storage provider.

title: ormb
description_detail: Docker for Your ML/DL Models Based on OCI Artifacts.
description-github: Docker for Your ML/DL Models Based on OCI Artifacts

title: Polyaxon
description_detail: A platform for reproducible and scalable machine learning and deep learning on kubernetes - [(Video)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Iexwrka_hys).
description-github: MLOps Tools For Managing & Orchestrating The Machine Learning LifeCycle

title: Quilt
description_detail: Versioning, reproducibility and deployment of data and models.
description-github: Quilt is a data mesh for connecting people with actionable data

title: Sacred
description_detail: Tool to help you configure, organize, log and reproduce machine learning experiments.
description-github: Sacred is a tool to help you configure, organize, log and reproduce experiments developed at IDSIA.

title: Studio
description_detail: Model management framework which minimizes the overhead involved with scheduling, running, monitoring and managing artifacts of your machine learning experiments.
description-github: Studio: Simplify and expedite model building process

title: TerminusDB
description_detail: A graph database management system that stores data like git.
description-github: TerminusDB is a distributed database with a collaboration model
